101104.PreviewText: ◆Make you the fashion icon of Asterleeds!

104200.PreviewText: ◆Use talents to grow stronger and define your unique combat style.

100804.PreviewText:
◆Follow the manual to track down bosses and elites.
Obtain rare materials & titles!

200501.PreviewText:
◆Tactical skill sets.
Use strategies to crush any foe!

800500.PreviewText:
◆Complete Season Pass for achievements.
Unlock emblems and items!

500100.PreviewText: ◆Join a Guild to find like-minded partners.

800400.PreviewText:
◆Buy and sell resources.
Savvy businessman can make profits out of it.

810009.PreviewText: ◆Boarlet is ready to go with you. Complete the main story quest to obtain Boarlet mount and explore the world!

300205.PreviewText:
◆Located on the first floor of the device.
Repeatable gear farming, easier with teammates.

300000.PreviewText: ◆Grab your fishing pole and catch all kinds of fish. Become the next fishing master!

501000.PreviewText: ◆You will always find a Life Skill that interests you.

200301.PreviewText:
◆Gain creature abilities.
Explore terrain freely with wolf sprint and eagle glide!

300301.PreviewText:
◆Complete Attack, Guardian, and Support trials.
Unlock talents and claim rewards!

300206.PreviewText:
◆Deadlier realms. Greater rewards.
Team up and conquer the unknown!

500888.PreviewText: ◆The mysterious Inverted Spire, facing stronger enemies and more threatening scene on each floor.

300105.PreviewText:
◆Explore deadly ruins.
Uncover the secrets of the Asterleeds War.

100709.PreviewText: ◆Refine attributes strategically to break power ceilings!

100710.PreviewText: ◆Embed suitable gems to enhance your gear effects!

102500.PreviewText: ◆Create a Homestead of your own! (Complete main quest [Luno Loop] and reach Lv.40 to unlock.)

800506.PreviewText: ◆Upgrade your Emblem and enhance your combat capabilities for this season!

810004.PreviewText: ◆Enter the mysterious ruins of Bapharian, collaborate in two dimensions, and defeat the guardian statues in the ruins!

810005.PreviewText: ◆Confront the power of ancient souls and defeat the former Kanamia warriors!

810006.PreviewText: ◆Enter the deep canyon that looks like it was fiercely clawed by a dragon, and battle dragons in the storm!

810008.PreviewText: ◆Seek the light in the darkness, and find the only path in the light!

810001.PreviewText: ◆Beneath the most treacherous waters of Asterleeds lies a bizarre large cavity.

810002.PreviewText: ◆A valley occupied by Muku and Goblins, with relatively rich mineral resources within.

810007.PreviewText: ◆Survive the hazardous unknown and finish the timed survey to earn high-value gear and materials!

104210.PreviewText: ◆Activate combat modifiers to enhance your combat capabilities!

810003.PreviewText: ◆A wild forest beyond the Asteria Plains, teeming with creatures rarely seen by humans.
